# pos-label



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Displays a human-readable label of the resource, provided by [Thing.label()](https://pod-os.org/reference/core/classes/thing/#label)

## Events

| Event             | Description | Type               |
| ----------------- | ----------- | ------------------ |
| `pod-os:resource` |             | `CustomEvent<any>` |
